main event: A blue-green streak of light was observed over Scott AFB, Illinois on November 5, 1961.
interesting points: The streak of light had a flash of yellow before changing to blue-green,The trajectory of the object was described as even and gentle,The observation lasted for about one second, Ground visual observation was made under clear weather conditions, The sighting was concluded to likely be a balloon but also noted as possibly astronomical.
witness description: military personnel at Scott AFB, identified as a reliable source
